name: HARP Vefa
description: In 1915, before the Dardanelles War, The heroic story of two soldiers who served in the Ottoman Empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: Intel I3 or Amd FX 6000 Series Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB Nvidia or Ati Graphics card DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I5 or Amd FX 8000 Series Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB NVidia GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11
